Title: Hongzhen Chronicle Volume XIX: Major Events II
Text:
...
March 5. Thunder started roaring at about 21:00–23:00, and the Sentinel Jué returned with a dead baby.
March 6. The thunder stopped around 01:00–03:00. Something strange was happening in the sky, and the stars were moving in reverse.
At 05:00–07:00 of the same day, the Sentinel Jué came to Hongzhen to entrust the baby to the townspeople. The baby looked completely normal with no signs of lifelessness.
(Note: It should be impossible for a dead baby to be brought back to life. I would never believe this if this was not my personal experience.)
...
